articles.description: Count Offset out as the United States begins receiving the COVID-19 vaccine. The Migos rapper told TMZ he's refusing to take the vaccine out of caution.
articles.content: Los Angeles, CA – Offset won’t be first in line to take Pfizer’s COVID-19 vaccine. On Saturday (December 12), the Migos rapper told TMZ he’s planning on passing in regards to the vaccine, highlightin… [+2119 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: 2,091 new cases, 18 new deaths in Orange County on Dec. 12 - OCRegister
articles.description: Availability of ICU beds in the county is down to 1.7%
articles.content:
The Orange County Health Care Agency reported 2,091 new cases of the coronavirus on Saturday, Dec. 12., increasing the cumulative total in the county to 99,393 cases.
